src_original: evaṃ ca punar bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu  anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyam. yena cittenānumodya pariṇāmayati tac
tāni ca vastūni tāny ārambaṇāni tāni ca kuśalamūlāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vigatāni vipariṇatāni,  katamad anumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ?
